name: Adventurer
ability: On your 1st night, the Storyteller sends you on an adventure. When you complete the adventure, you receive a piece of advice or information from the Storyteller that night.
flavor: Adventure time! Come on, grab your friends. We'll go to very distant lands.

otherNightReminder: If the Barbie was nominated today, they point to a player. That player is poisoned.
name: Barby
ability: If you were nominated today, choose a player: they are poisoned for the rest of the game.
flavor: An itch must be scratched.

otherNightReminder: The Bloodletter points to a player. That player dies. If that player is a Minion, mark that player with the "Dead" and "+1 attack" reminders (that player is the only player to die tonight). Otherwise, allow the Bloodletter to point to and kill an additonal player for each "+1 attack" reminder in play.
name: Bloodletter
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. For each Minion killed this way, you may choose an additional player each night (a chosen Minion is the only player to die that night).
flavor: Your sacrifice shan't be in vain...

name: Champion
ability: All Outsiders are replaced with Townsfolk.
flavor: The price of victory is high, but so are the rewards.

otherNightReminder: If the Chatterbox is not marked with the "Spoken" reminder, they die.
name: Chatterbox
ability: You start knowing a secret word. Each night*, if no other player said the secret word, you die.
flavor: Repeat after me.

otherNightReminder: If no living player was executed during the day: The Cheesemonger points to player. That player dies.
name: Cheesemonger
ability: Each night*, if no living player was executed during the day, choose a player: they die.
flavor: What happens to the hole when the cheese is gone?

name: Chicane
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. If all of your Minions are alive, you can't die.
flavor: Ask any racer. Any real racer. It don't matter if you win by an inch or a mile. Winning's winning.

name: Chimera
ability: Once per game, if another player nominated, you may choose for that player to die immediately.
flavor: Nightmares are seldom a foreshadowing of real events, but always a showing of real fears.

otherNightReminder: If the Clerk is marked with the "Executed" reminder, show the character token of the player that nominated them.
name: Clerk
ability: If you die by execution, that night you learn who nominated you.
flavor: There were some discrepancies in the financial statements.

name: Creeper
ability: If you die by execution, 1 of your alive neighbors immediately dies.
flavor: You invade this pristine world, claiming it as your own simply by your presence. You slaughter innocent animals for their hides and their flesh. You devastate the landscape and gouge out the earth to build monuments to your vanity. And yet you call me the monster.

otherNightReminder: If the Crybaby is not marked with the "Chosen" reminder, they die.
name: Crybaby
ability: Each night*, if you are not chosen by another player with their ability, you die.
flavor: I'm not addicted to attention. Anyway, listen to this...

firstNightReminder: Show the finger signal for the number of outsiders sat next to an evil player.
name: Customs Officer
ability: You start knowing how many outsiders are neighboring evil players. [+1 Outsider]
flavor: Have you filled in th proper forms?

name: Draggletail
ability: Your 2 alive Townsfolk neighbors are poisoned and can die, even if for some reason they could not.
flavor: It's not easy being cheesy.

otherNightReminder: If a player is marked with the "Spoken" reminder, they die.
name: Earworm
ability: You start knowing a secret word. The first good character to say that word dies the following night. When someone dies this way, you learn a new word.
flavor: Would you like to know a deadly secret?

name: Eavesdropper
ability: Each night*, you learn how many private conversations that day consisted only of evil players.
flavor: I couldn't help overehearing...

firstNightReminder: Show the character tokens of all Minions in play.
name: Exterminator
ability: You start knowing which Minions are in play.
flavor: Don't knock the power of a pest. Persistence and stubbornness can be useful in many situations.

otherNightReminder: The Fowel points to a player. That player dies.
name: Fowel
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Players that target you with their ability become poisoned until the next night.
flavor: My pleasure.

firstNightReminder: Choose a living Minion who would act tonight. Have them carry out their action a second time immediately after their first action tonight.
otherNightReminder: Choose a living Minion who would act tonight. Have them carry out their action a second time immediately after their first action tonight.
name: Glutton
ability: Each night, a Minion acts twice, even if you are dead.
flavor: I think I'll have another.

otherNightReminder: The previously poisoned players are no longer poisoned. Any players marked with the "Talked" reminder are now poisoned.
name: Grima
ability: The first 2 Townsfolk you have private conversations with are poisoned that night and the next day.
flavor: Oh, but this order does not come from me. It comes from the King.

name: Hoarder
ability: When you die, a Townsfolk loses their ability.
flavor: These are my things! I need them!

otherNightReminder: If the Hostess is marked with the "Talked to evil" reminder, they die.
name: Hostess
ability: Each night*, if you had a private conversation with an evil player, you die.
flavor: Are you enjoying yourself?

firstNightReminder: Write down a piece of information or advice, wake the Insider and give it to them.
otherNightReminder: Write down a piece of information or advice, wake the Insider and give it to them.
name: Insider
ability: Each night, you receive a piece of information or advice from the storyteller.
flavor: Every man is surrounded by a neighborhood of voluntary spies.

otherNightReminder: If the Instigator is marked with the "Has executed" reminder, they point to a player. That player dies.
name: Instigator
ability: Each night*, if a player you nominated that day was executed, choose a player: they die.
flavor: Let's get it started in here.

otherNightReminder: If the Demon is marked with the "Accused" reminder, the J'Accuse dies.
name: J'Accuse
ability: Once per game, during the day, publicly choose a player: if they are the Demon, you die that night.
flavor: I have but one passion: to enlighten those who have been kept in the dark, in the name of humanity which has suffered so much and is entitled to happiness. My fiery protest is simpy the cry of my very soul.

name: Jailbird
ability: If either of your living neighbors die, you might die that night. If you die, 1 of your living neighbors might die that night.
flavor: To forgive is to set a prisoner free and discover that the prisoner was you.

name: Leper
ability: If a player targets you with their ability, a good player might die, even if you are dead.
flavor: The worst disease is the feeling of being unwanted.

otherNightReminder: The previously protected players are no longer protected. The Martyr points to two players. Mark those players with the "Protected" reminder.
name: Martyr
ability: Each night*, choose 2 players: if the Demon kills either tonight, you die instead.
flavor: My sacrifice shan't be in vain...

otherNightReminder: The Mind Flayer points to a player. That player dies. Show the Mind Flayer that player's character token. If the Mind Flayer chooses, move the "Has ability" reminder to that player.
name: Mind Flayer
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. If a living player dies this way, you learn their character & may choose to gain their ability. You may only have one additional ability at a time.
flavor: I'm sure if we bashed your head in, all sorts of secrets would come tumbling out...

firstNightReminder: Mark one Mitosis with the "1st" reminder, show the "This is the Demon" card, and point to other Mitosis. Mark the other Mitosis with the "2nd" reminder, show the "This is the Demon" card, and point to first Mitosis.
otherNightReminder: Wake the Mitosis marked with the "1st" reminder. They point to a player. That player dies. Wake the Mitosis marked with the "2nd" reminder. They point to a player. That player dies.
name: Mitosis
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. There are 2 Mitosis in play & good must kill both to win. You know the other Mitosis. [-1 Minion]
flavor: Life finds a way.

otherNightReminder: Show the finger signal for the number of players that nominated a player of different alignment.
name: Messenger
ability: Each night*, you learn how many players nominated a player of different alignment.
flavor: Saying nothing is also saying something.

otherNightReminder: Show the finger signal for the number of deaths prevented tonight.
name: Mortician
ability: Each night*, you learn how many deaths were prevented during the night.
flavor: The body keeps the score.

otherNightReminder: If the Demon is marked with the "Nominated" reminder, they don't wake up tonight.
name: Mudlark
ability: The 1st time you nominate, if you nominate the Demon, they don't wake that night.
flavor: The mud will wash off but the memories will last forever.

otherNightReminder: If the Necromancer has not used their ability: The Necromancer either shakes their head no, or points to a player. That player is now alive.
name: Necromancer
ability: Once per game, at night*, choose a dead player: they are resurrected. Good can't win if you live.
flavor: Most men say they will fight until their last breath. I say let them fight a bit longer.

otherNightReminder: Wake the Night Hunter and Minions. The Night Hunter points to a player. That player dies.
name: Night Hunter
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. You and your Minions always wake up together.
flavor: Afraid of the dark? I sure hope so.

name: Patsy
ability: If the Demon dies, you die instead.
flavor: You've got the wrong guy!

name: Pilgrim
ability: If you die at night, you lose your ghost vote.
flavor: Some beautiful paths can't be discovered without getting lost.

firstNightReminder: Show the "This is the Demon" card. Point to the Demon.
name: Prophet
ability: You start knowing the Demon. If you are mad that that player is evil or that you are the Prophet, your team loses, even when dead.
flavor: A vision that was planted in my brain still remains...

name: Provost
ability: The 1st time a player you nominate is executed, the day doesn't end.
flavor: You have brains in your head. You have feet in your shoes. You can steer yourself any direction you choose.

name: Revenant
ability: You may nominate even if dead & regain your ghost vote after each use.
flavor: As long as you can still grab a breath, you fight. You breathe. Keep breathing. When there is a storm and you stand in front of a tree, if you look at its branches, you swear it will fall. But if you watch the trunk, you will see its stability.

name: Rubber Ducky
ability: Townsfolk abilities yield false info.
flavor: I am the one.

firstNightReminder: If the Scourge points to two players, mark each of those players with the "Marked" reminder. If the Scourge signals decapitation, each player with a "Marked" reminder dies.
otherNightReminder: If the Scourge points to two players, mark each of those players with the "Marked" reminder. If the Scourge signals decapitation, each player with a "Marked" reminder dies.
name: Scourge
ability: Each night, choose to mark 2 players or kill all marked players (players die in the order in which they were marked.
flavor: Some stains don't wash off.

otherNightReminder: Wake the Scribe and point to the player with the "Chosen" reminder.
name: Scribe
ability: Each night*, learn 1 player chosen by the Demon. (Or that no one was chosen.)
flavor: To write is to be eternal, omnipresent.

name: Sheriff
ability: 1 of your Townsfolk neighbors is drunk. Your Townsfolk neighbors cannot be killed by the Demon.
flavor: Come with me if you want to live.

name: Sherpa
ability: If a good player dies, you might die instead.
flavor: I will show you the way.

firstNightReminder: The Smuggler points to a player. If that player would wake tonight, mark them with the "Drunk" reminder, and have the Smuggler carry out their action (interact with the Smuggler the same way you would their chosen player, but don't say their role).
otherNightReminder: The Smuggler points to a player. If that player would wake tonight, mark them with the "Drunk" reminder, and have the Smuggler carry out their action (interact with the Smuggler the same way you would their chosen player, but don't say their role).
name: Smuggler
ability: Each night, choose a player. If they would wake tonight, they are drunk & you gain their ability until dusk. If you choose an evil player, you become evil & lose your ability.
flavor: I know how to get things.

firstNightReminder: The Spork points to 1 or 2 players. Those players are poisoned.
otherNightReminder: The previously poisoned players are no longer poisoned. The Spork points to 1 or 2 players. Those players are poisoned.
name: Spork
ability: Each night, choose 1 or 2 players: they are poisoned tonight and tomorrow day. If you choose 2, the Demon might also be poisoned tonight and tomorrow day.
flavor: Where my spores fly, I do not decide; that is up to the wind.

firstNightReminder: The Succubus points to a player. Mark that player with the "Chosen" reminder.
otherNightReminder: The Succubus points to a player. Mark that player with the "Chosen" reminder. If a player is marked with the "Talked" reminder, ask the Succubus if they want that player to die.
name: Succubus
ability: Each night, choose a player: if you have a private conversation with them tomorrow, you may choose to kill them that night.
flavor: Sometimes you wake up from a dream. Sometimes you wake up in a dream. And sometimes, every once in a while, you wake up in someone else's dream.

name: Trawler
ability: Once per game, at night*, choose a dead player: you gain their ability.
flavor: When life gives you lemons, order the lobster tail.

otherNightReminder: Show the finger signal for the number of true statements.
name: Tribute
ability: On your 1st day, each player may make a public statement. That night, you learn how many were true.
flavor: You'll stand before your own horn of plenty, ready to receive all that is waiting to come to you.

name: Trickster
ability: If there are 5 or more characters alive & the Demon dies, the Demon swaps characters & alignments with you & is then poisoned (the game continues).
flavor: I am looking for the one I can't fool.

firstNightReminder: Show the character tokens of 2 not-in-play characters
name: Urchin
ability: You start knowing 2 not-in-play characters.
flavor: The streets speak.

firstNightReminder: The Vodou points to a character. If that character is in play, they are poisoned.
otherNightReminder: The previously poisoned player is no longer poisoned. The Vodou points to a character. If that character is in play, they are poisoned.
name: Vodou
ability: Each night, choose a character: if in play, they are poisoned tonight and tomorrow day.
flavor: I say a little prayer for you.

otherNightReminder: If the Demon is marked with the "Chosen" reminder, show the "This character selected you" card, then the Whaler token. If the Demon doesn't kill a Minion tonight, a Minion dies immediately after the Demon acts.
name: Whaler
ability: Once per game, during the day, privately visit the Storyteller & choose a player: if you choose the Demon, that night the Demon learns this & a Minion dies.
flavor: Towards thee I roll, thou all-destroying but unconquering whale; to the last I grapple with thee; from hell's heart I stab at thee; for hate's sake I spit my last breath at thee.

otherNightReminder: If the Whisper's public statement was true: Choose a player not protected from dying tonight. That player dies.
name: Whisper
ability: Each day, you may make a statement in private to the Storyteller. Tonight, if it was true, a player dies.
flavor: The quietude: therein lie the most profound truths.

otherNightReminder: If the Zealot died tonight and a Townsfolk is dead: a dead Townsfolk is now alive.
name: Zealot
ability: If you die at night, a dead Townsfolk is resurrected.
flavor: I long for combat.
